name: MazeEscaper
description:
The game is about finding your way out of the maze and defiting as much enemies as possible.

Controls:

W - Walk forward

S - Walk backwards 

A - Turn Left

D - Turn Right

E - Interact with shop / chest

LeftMouseButton - Shooting

1 - Fire ball (first ability)

2 - Slow (second ability)

3 - Poison (third ability)

There are some basic controller implementations for the movement but the abilities and other interactions doesn't support any controller.

I recommend not trying to rush through the level and experiment with the shop and try to beat as many enemies as you can so you can buy the upgrades.
